item.title: Go common faqs
item.author: AN
item.description:
常见问题

1、 报错 404 Not Found 或 server response: not found: xxx.com/packagekit@v1

设置公司私有依赖仓库

go env -w GOPRIVATE="g.xxx.com"
go env -w GONOPROXY="g.xxx.com"
go env -w GONOSUMDB="g.xxx.com"

2、 报错 wire: xxx: could not import xxx (invalid package name: “”)

执行：go mod tidy

思路：先点蓝色部分，会跳到具体报错代码行，鼠标放到报错位置会提示具体报错问题

item.title: Go Error set
item.author: AN
item.description:
错误集

1. Unsolicited response received on idle HTTP channel starting with "HTTP/1.1 502 Bad Gateway

https://github.com/golang/go/issues/19895 | Unsolicited response received on idle HTTP channel… · Issue #19895 · golang/go https://blog.csdn.net/zhizhengguan/article/details/90234211 | iris ：Unsolicited response received on idle HTTP channel starting with “[]\n“； err=_OceanStar的学习笔记的博客-CSDN博客 https://gist.github.com/cespare/f4352a11bac5cced9458 | Go proxy race.
